overview:
Director - founder of the Bookingbox Organisation.

Building an interactive network of Bookingbox portals for around 50 countries worldwide , offering background information about tourism , culture , fauna and flora , …

The company Bookingbox Ltd is based in Skipton , North Yorkshire , but the production office is located in Urubamba , Peru.

The Bookingbox portals are constructed around Drupal and Tradedoubler technology ; cms , ppc , pps , ppl , online advertising and sales.
